page.title: 16My Dad broke Clevedon Pier 2
page.content: _Mr.Gay_ Just after 10.00 a.m. when I was taking my second set of readings I found that I could not take some of the measurements. Thinking that perhaps the men had disturbed the equipment, I went to the cafe opposite where they were having their tea break _Nicola_ Then what happened? _Mr.Gay_ As we stood there, we heard an almighty BANG!....and the end pair of legs and spans of the pier collapsed and fell into the sea. We cut the remaining water bags and removed the test load from the pier. _Nicola_ Could you have saved the pier? _Mr.Gay_ No. We were expecting a vertical bending of the pier. In fact the failure was caused by a sideways movement. This took only 10 minutes! _Nicola_ Were there any injuries? _Mr.Gay_ Only a little hurt pride!
